questions.question:
A company focused on sustainable technology is training a deep learning model using Amazon SageMaker to develop a computer vision application. The training process involves a large dataset of high-resolution images and requires significant computational resources. The companyâ€™s primary goal is to minimize energy consumption and carbon footprint while still achieving efficient training performance.

Which instance type should the company select for their training job in Amazon SageMaker to maximize energy efficiency and meet their sustainability goals?
